overview.en: Based on the open and transparent encryption algorithm based on blockchain technology, MGXT builds the Internet of things distributed data trust mechanism, builds mutual trust through consensus, and promotes the horizontal flow of information and multi-party collaboration. Through third-party developers to develop tools such as skins and emojis for the community, and through announcement release, commercial task release and other advertising publicity.
overview.zh: MGXT基于区块链技术公开透明的加密算法，构建物联网分布式数据信任机制，通过共识建立互信，促进信息横向流动和多方协作。通过第三方开发者为社区开发皮肤、表情包等工具，通过公告投放、商业任务发布等进行广告宣传。
